body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support team at Cloud Hotels. My name is Jesse Hayes. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jesse, my name is Samantha Flores.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Samantha! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I wanted to report a problem with noisy neighbors in the room next to mine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Samantha. To further assist you, could you please provide me with the room number where you are staying and the time that the noise typically occurs?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am in room two zero three and the noise usually starts around eleven pm.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Samantha. I will escalate this issue to our hotel management team for immediate action.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your quick response, Jesse.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Samantha. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help, Jesse.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It was my pleasure to assist you, Samantha. Thank you for reaching out to Cloud Hotels. Have a great day!
